author: JACKSON WALKER | The National Desk
title: chevron-right
text: {p}Sunday will be a lot calmer than Saturday with some nice sunbreaks for the morning and most of the afternoon. Showers will start moving back after sunset. Highs today will hit the mid to upper 50s.{/p}{p}Showers will take over tonight making for a wet start to your Monday morning. Lows should drop to the upper 40s in most spots.{/p}{p}Monday will have frequent showers and the chance of a thundershower or two. The best chance to hear the rumble of thunder will be along the ocean beaches, areas south of Tacoma, and in the Puget Sound Convergence Zone of north King and south Snohomish Counties. Highs on Monday will make it to the mid to upper 50s once again.{/p}{p}Rain will continue on Tuesday under gray skies. Highs should drop back to a bit to the mid-50s.{/p}{p}Right now the forecast models say Wednesday should bring mostly dry weather with some sunbreaks. It will not be all that warm with daytime highs only getting to the low to mid-50s.{/p}{p}Theron Zahn{br}The KOMO 4-Cast Team{br}{/p}{p}{strong}Updated Sunday Morning{/strong}{/p}{p}Rep. Rashida Tlaib, D-Mich., condemned Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Wednesday by claiming he had committed war crimes while defending his country from Hamas terrorists.{br}{/p}{p}“Genocidal maniac,” Rep. Tlaib, a member of the ultra-progressive congressional group \"The Squad,\" jeered in a fiery Instagram story post.{/p}{blockquote}“Every member of Congress who sits down with this murderer is supporting a war criminal,\" she continued. \"We will never ever forget.”{/blockquote}{p}The post was one of several in a string condemning Israel and President Joe Biden for continuing to support the Jewish state's war efforts.{/p}{p}Rep. Tlaib, who is Palestinian-American, has been a fierce supporter of Palestine as the war continues between Hamas terrorists and Israel. She was {a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/top-videos/house-votes-to-censure-rep-rashida-tlaib-over-her-israel-hamas-rhetoric-in-a-stunning-rebuke-white-house-united-states-palestine-war-marjorie-taylor-greene-government-politics\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/top-videos/house-votes-to-censure-rep-rashida-tlaib-over-her-israel-hamas-rhetoric-in-a-stunning-rebuke-white-house-united-states-palestine-war-marjorie-taylor-greene-government-politics\"}censured {/a}by Congress in November in connection to her rhetoric about the war.{/p}{p}{strong}READ MORE |{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/aoc-slammed-for-christmas-message-claiming-jesus-was-palestinian-ignorant-illiterate-embarrassment#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/aoc-slammed-for-christmas-message-claiming-jesus-was-palestinian-ignorant-illiterate-embarrassment#\"}AOC slammed for Christmas message comparing Jesus to Palestinians{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}The censureship has hardly dampened her language, however. On Veterans Day, she {a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/rep-tlaib-uses-veterans-day-to-push-gaza-strip-ceasefire-we-must-remember-the-cost-of-war-israel-palestine-hamas-middle-east-conflict-terrorism-censure\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/rep-tlaib-uses-veterans-day-to-push-gaza-strip-ceasefire-we-must-remember-the-cost-of-war-israel-palestine-hamas-middle-east-conflict-terrorism-censure\"}recognized {/a}“courageous veterans” working with her to petition for a ceasefire in the Gaza Strip.{/p}{p}Other members of “The Squad” have rallied behind Rep. Tlaib to pressure politicians to support a ceasefire. Rep. Jamaal Bowman, D-N.Y., recently{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/squad-member-deletes-post-claiming-gaza-hospital-was-bombed-confirmation-is-difficult-jamaal-bowman-palestine-new-york-congress-house-representative\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/squad-member-deletes-post-claiming-gaza-hospital-was-bombed-confirmation-is-difficult-jamaal-bowman-palestine-new-york-congress-house-representative\"}deleted {/a}a post suggesting a Palestinian hospital was bombed by a U.S.-made missile. His post claimed the bomb was a “R9X Hellfire missile,” which uses spinning blades to inflict damage rather than exploding.{/p}{p}Also speaking out was Rep. Pramila Jayapal, D-Wash., who called for \"balance\" when reacting to war crimes while discussing Hamas terrorists' rapes of Israeli women.{/p}{p}{strong}READ MORE |{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/democrats-turn-on-the-squad-as-it-doubles-down-on-anti-israel-rhetoric-pramila-jayapal-rashida-tlaib-marjorie-taylor-greene-john-fetterman#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/democrats-turn-on-the-squad-as-it-doubles-down-on-anti-israel-rhetoric-pramila-jayapal-rashida-tlaib-marjorie-taylor-greene-john-fetterman#\"}Democrats turn on 'The Squad' as it doubles down on anti-Israel rhetoric{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}Sen. John Fetterman, D-Pa., has{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/sen-fetterman-calls-out-the-squad-for-blaming-gaza-attacks-on-israel-truly-disturbing-ilhan-omar-aoc-rashida-tlaib-palestine-\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/sen-fetterman-calls-out-the-squad-for-blaming-gaza-attacks-on-israel-truly-disturbing-ilhan-omar-aoc-rashida-tlaib-palestine-\"}condemned {/a}“The Squad,” saying their stances are unacceptable.{/p}{p}“It’s truly disturbing that Members of Congress rushed to blame Israel for the hospital tragedy in Gaza,” Sen. Fetterman wrote on X, the platform formerly known as Twitter. “Who would take the word of a group that just massacred innocent Israeli civilians over our key ally?”{/p}{p}Sunday will be a lot calmer than Saturday with some nice sunbreaks for the morning and most of the afternoon. Showers will start moving back after sunset. Highs today will hit the mid to upper 50s.{/p}{p}Showers will take over tonight making for a wet start to your Monday morning. Lows should drop to the upper 40s in most spots.{/p}{p}Monday will have frequent showers and the chance of a thundershower or two. The best chance to hear the rumble of thunder will be along the ocean beaches, areas south of Tacoma, and in the Puget Sound Convergence Zone of north King and south Snohomish Counties. Highs on Monday will make it to the mid to upper 50s once again.{/p}{p}Rain will continue on Tuesday under gray skies. Highs should drop back to a bit to the mid-50s.{/p}{p}Right now the forecast models say Wednesday should bring mostly dry weather with some sunbreaks. It will not be all that warm with daytime highs only getting to the low to mid-50s.{/p}{p}Theron Zahn{br}The KOMO 4-Cast Team{br}{/p}{p}{strong}Updated Sunday Morning{/strong}{/p}{p}Rep. Tlaib, a member of the ultra-progressive congressional group \"The Squad,\" jeered in a fiery Instagram story post.{/p}{blockquote}“Every member of Congress who sits down with this murderer is supporting a war criminal,\" she continued. \"We will never ever forget.”{/blockquote}{p}The post was one of several in a string condemning Israel and President Joe Biden for continuing to support the Jewish state's war efforts.{/p}{p}Rep. Tlaib, who is Palestinian-American, has been a fierce supporter of Palestine as the war continues between Hamas terrorists and Israel. She was {a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/top-videos/house-votes-to-censure-rep-rashida-tlaib-over-her-israel-hamas-rhetoric-in-a-stunning-rebuke-white-house-united-states-palestine-war-marjorie-taylor-greene-government-politics\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/top-videos/house-votes-to-censure-rep-rashida-tlaib-over-her-israel-hamas-rhetoric-in-a-stunning-rebuke-white-house-united-states-palestine-war-marjorie-taylor-greene-government-politics\"}censured {/a}by Congress in November in connection to her rhetoric about the war.{/p}{p}{strong}READ MORE |{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/aoc-slammed-for-christmas-message-claiming-jesus-was-palestinian-ignorant-illiterate-embarrassment#\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/aoc-slammed-for-christmas-message-claiming-jesus-was-palestinian-ignorant-illiterate-embarrassment#\"}AOC slammed for Christmas message comparing Jesus to Palestinians{/a}{/strong}{/p}{p}The censureship has hardly dampened her language, however. His post claimed the bomb was a “R9X Hellfire missile,” which uses spinning blades to inflict damage rather than exploding.{/p}{p}Also speaking out was Rep. John Fetterman, D-Pa., has{ }{a href=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/sen-fetterman-calls-out-the-squad-for-blaming-gaza-attacks-on-israel-truly-disturbing-ilhan-omar-aoc-rashida-tlaib-palestine-\" target=\"_blank\" title=\"https://thenationaldesk.com/news/americas-news-now/sen-fetterman-calls-out-the-squad-for-blaming-gaza-attacks-on-israel-truly-disturbing-ilhan-omar-aoc-rashida-tlaib-palestine-\"}condemned {/a}“The Squad,” saying their stances are unacceptable.{/p}{p}“It’s truly disturbing that Members of Congress rushed to blame Israel for the hospital tragedy in Gaza,” Sen. Fetterman wrote on X, the platform formerly known as Twitter. “Who would take the word of a group that just massacred innocent Israeli civilians over our key ally?”{/p}
